nodes.text: Rralla was a male Wookiee youngling who was inside the Tabor Hospital on Protobranch when a solar storm hit the planet and disabled its antigrav platforms. Along with Doctor Pira, Rralla and the other younglings were rescued from the wreckage of the hospital by the Jedi Padawans Dooku and Sifo-Dyas.
Rralla first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019.
